content.detailedDescription:
I was at the kitchen window which faces west, washing my hands. i was looking out, the light in the kitchen was off as i was just passing through. i noticed what i thought at first to be a big, bright star. then i quickly noticed it changing colors. it was, in a constant rhythem, changing red, white, bluish green. so, i stared at it a moment. as i did, it moved suddendenly in a semi-circle like a backwards "c". i then yelled for my roommate to come look. when she got to the window, i told her to just look at that star. she said, "it's changing colors!". then i told her to really watch it a moment. this time it moved left then up in a "l" type 90 degree manner, not the curved motion of before. 
we went outside to get a better look and just stared for about 20 minutes. when it would move i'd ask her, "what did it do then?" and she would answer "move left" or "move right" whatever it did. i did so, so that it would test that it wasn't just me thinking it was moving. she always saw it move the same direction and pattern as i did. 
i called my brother who was staying out at a friend's two counties nw of mine. he reluctantly went out to look and then got excited because he saw it flashing and dancing too.
at this point it was around midnight and it seemed smaller, so i would assume further away. i went in for a bit and then come back out again at about 12:30 and it was way off. i could still see it flashing the colors but i barely could tell it was moveing and at this point it was so far away i could barely see it at all. it seemed to be further west. 
another thing that i have trouble discribing, so bear with me, is that sometimes while it was close, it looked as though it was shining a light down to the ground. much like a flashlight's light beam can be seen... it too had a light comming from beneath and shining down and out until it faded out to where it was not noticable. this "shining down" look was only there periodically. 
i don't know what to make of it, there was no noises. no engine sounds or humming. it was not three different lights flashing like a plane... it was one object changing colors. when i told my mother i likened the motions it had to the jerkiness of those "claw" machines. you move the claw left and right and forward and back... the motion is always fast, then stop, fast then stop. like that. 
i got the feeling whatever it was was looking for something or at something. i can't imagine a plane moving like that or even ever seen a helicopter that could move as clean and quick like that... and like i said... it was one object in three colors not three lights on one object. 
i was never scared of it... it seemed too far away for that, but i was entralled by it and totally in awe. 
eventually, it just got so small i had trouble seeing it. i imagine it keep "going". the whole ordeal took about a hour and a half... once again, not at all like a plane.
content.summary: Star-like object moving left, right, up, down and constantly changing colors from red to white to a bluish green.

content.detailedDescription: On sat. sept 4th my husband, my son and i were traveling north on i-71 in ohio about a few minutes before 9 p.M. near kings mills,ohio when we saw a flash of light in the sky. it resembled a comet traveling west to east horizontally across the sky then disappeared then reappeared going east to west. our first reaction was it was meteorites but then we thought about it and they usually don't go horizontally. then about 15 to 20 minutes later as we drove thru lebanon, ohio north on st.Rt.48 about 9:10 p.M. we saw a group of 5 lights low to the west horizon toward middletown, ohio. the lights were just sitting in the sky in a sort of pentagon shape.  they stayed still for a couple of minutes then they shifted their shape and 3 of the lights moved sideways.  then because we were driving the trees were in way and we weren't able to see the lights anymore. we checked the local news, tv and internet because we were in awe of what we saw and don't know what to make of it but we have seen nothing reporting strange lights that night.  we also found out that friends of ours that were leaving the same party as us that night also saw the same type of lights above i-71.
content.summary: Comet like shape flashing across sky east to west then west to east horizontally.

content.detailedDescription: Very clear night, went out to look at the starts, walked out on our back deck and looked up and from the east just above the neighbours house my husband & i saw what appeared to be a luminous amber  boomerang shaped object.I immediaely called my husband to come and look.  i knew it was a ufo but my husband wasn't sure.  it appeard extremely large and low but we couldn't establish really how high up or close it was.  it travelled very slowly and silently over our heads and then the next house to the left.  it suddenly sped up travelling west then vanished out of site.  we both decided to go into the house and each separtely draw what we saw and then compared sketches.  our drawings were almost identical.
content.summary: Amber colour, silent, very large & appearing low, travelling east to west slowly then sped off at an unbelievable speed & was gone.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching with my wife the passing of the iss. i had this
feeling that i should turn around, when i did i saw the triangle,
about six block due north and 150 feet up heading due east. got to 
see it for about 2 mins then headed north lost sight. this thing 
was about just over the ike expressway. no noise at all
just glided along. i just got a kick out of seeing it always
wanted to see one. "j"
content.summary: Black triangle with lights on corners and red light on bottom.

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting on the porch and the lights just appeared and starting moving ..At first they were paired up two by two and then they moved into this shape thats in the video and some more show up and then leave ..They would also turn off their lights  and reappear somewhere else..This is the second time we see them in a 2 month period..We have asked locals and they have no idea..We just moved here from the east coast. we live right next to the air force base but the way we were facing is not towards the base..There is a airport that way but we can hear the planes from that airport and these lights made no noise..They almost seemed like they were playing..We maybe thought they were parachuters but the way the lights would move up and down and disappear ruled that out. they looked just like a star shape. we lost sight of them because they just all went away..They didnt fly away just turned off the lights and were gone.I have videos of it but it wouldnt go through on this website..Just email me and i can send them to you
content.summary: We saw six lights appear by our apartments. they would make different formations.

content.detailedDescription:
i am a student here in eugene, oregon. i have my ged and i'm studying to become a computer programmer. (i used to work at subway)
the events i'm about to describe to you are real, and i didn't make them up. about 2 years ago i started noticing subtle ambiguous coincidences on radio and other media happening. creatine in particular stood our as having weird effects. first let me tell you i've been a poster on aspiesforfreedom.Org and i think theres a direct link between schizophrenia / autism and these so called alien abductions. i've actually studied a lot about the mental illness schizophrenia before the events took place. about a year and a half ago i was at home aligning crystals to my chakra centers for the heck of it. i wanted to see if these chakra points would do anything if i placed the stones on them. at this same time i was taking pregnenolone, dhea, and probably creatine as supplements. the first ufo sighting i had was after eating dinner at my house. i went outside and i saw a blue flash of light hit the ground a few feet in front of me. after i went back inside my house i hopped on facebook.Com at about 8pm pacific time and i started hearing voices chanting someones name. i woke up the next morning and the person's name  had changed. the next thing i did was report this event to mufon's ufo network. i know you're probably thinking "hey he's nuts" and i have been comitted to a mental hospital for this very reason. in fact i've grown to accept it as a mental illness despite having aliens wake me up at night in my dreams. let me tell you guys (it's not just sleep paralysis). if you've ever had the experience of waking up at night, and not being able to move then you know what sleep paralysis is like. well i'm here to tell you that it is not just sleep paraylysis like they're saying! don't believe the lies... anyway... back to the story. the voices first told me they were witches, then lucifer star of the morning, and then aliens. look all i know is that there strong and they're harassing me.
content.summary: Eugene, oregon abduction - it's frustrating dealing with aliens.

content.detailedDescription: I saw this object under a bank of clouds northeast of blissfield/towards monroe, mi no other stars or objects around it. i was curious because i it was so bright and under the low clouds. i watched the light as i drove home to toledo and as i travelled through ottawa lake, i noticed the light was closer to toledo than monroe. as i turned onto sterns rode i watched and the object seemed to gradually travel to toledo. i watched it until i returned home and the last i saw it, it was east of toledo near lake erie.
content.summary: Bright white light rotating with a red light.

content.detailedDescription:
I went out my back door to have cigaette, looked up and saw a chinese-type lntern thing with a long string attached, dangling below it, with lights as well. there was a plane-like object on the same trajectory that dissapeared at the same time the lantern-thing vanished. the airplane-ish object was clearly much higher than the lantern-ish obeject, though after they vanished, other airplanes were flying in a normal flight line.

it happened very fast, maybe 30 to 45 seconds.
content.summary: Chinese-type lantern with dangling line and higher elevated fireball entity following.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and 6 friends were at a park. i looked up to the sky and saw this neon green very bright object was moving across the sky at decent speed.  i yelled wtf!  the person sitting next to me glanced up in time to also see it before it just vanished or turned off its lights. no noise was heard but it was quite a good distance away.
content.summary: Bright green object moving across the sky and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I came from school around 2:40 i would estimate. my older sister and a neighbor lady had been standing outside and watching a large cluster of flying saucers my sister said. both of them witnessed this. my sister is living. the neighbor passed away many years ago. they had no idea who to report this to. as i recall no one ever talked about it after that day.

this is a second hand report. my sister and the neighbor were of very sound mind. my mom took an interest in ufo books from the library after that. i believe these would have been et, because we probably would not have developed a whole fleet at that time. i doubt the germans came from the poles with them!

this is not specific enough to archive, but thought you would like to know many people are aware they exist both et and usa, maybe russia has them too by now. 

the bible calls lucifer the prince of the powers of the air. this is not just spiritual, they left the upper bands and enter our universe.
content.summary: I cannot be too precise. it was 50 + years ago.

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting on the front porch.I looked off in the distance and above the trees in the east i saw three very bright stars in a triangle pattern.There were'nt many stars out yet and i was thinking about my son starting astronomy class this week.I said to my husband "are those stars over there?" he commented how strange to see those three bright stars so low on the skyline in the east.The one star started to move towards the other.Then they were all moving slowly as if floating.We were all amazed and tried to take a video but the battery was dead.We would lose sight of them behind the trees and rooftops.I called my neighbor who lives closer to that direction.Her family went outside and they witnessed the same slow moving bright stars.They told me they witnessed one go directly above and over the back field and disappear.There was no sound related to thier sighting.We saw one bright star appear again and move slowly over the horizon.This went on for about 30 minutes then they were gone.
content.summary: Three very bright star like objects moving slowly.

content.detailedDescription:
Coming home from a concert across town, nearing 11pm, my friend and i drove home down the motorway following the slip road which would lead off to where we live. as we pulled onto the slip road i noticed an orange light from the corner of my eye, at first passing it off as the reflection of the orange streetlights on my window. moving parallel to our car no more than 800ft off the ground and to our right. (we are right hand drive here in the uk) shocked i alerted my friend to the ball of light, who said he had noticed it as well. it was travelling easily at about 35 miles per hour. the ball travelled along the old belfast road, pretty much parallel to our direction so we decided to pursue, both excited and rather disturbed. i pulled in sharply at the side of the road and put the window down as my friend attempted to record it on his mobile phone but no avail. as the object moved on i pulled back onto the old belfast road and continued to follow it until we arrived at a car park for the sports centre where we stopped quickly and jumped out but the object at this point - continuing on it's way - faded to black, although we could vaguely see it's silouhette against the sky for maybe a second after the orange disappeared.

the object itself was definitely the size of a small car, and as we said, no more than 800 ft up. lit up like an orange ball unfortunately due to the speed at which we were travelling, the poor quality of our cameras and the haze of streetlights our footage didn't capture the object. when i returned home i told my parents about it, who were equally confused but could see that i was shaken by what i'd seen.
content.summary: Orange light moving steadily and quickly across the sky at quite a low altitude in an urban area which then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I drive 300+ miles daily. this was a exceptionally late night that we got out to start work. i was on a rural backroad when i took a nature break.  as i was out of the car i was looking at the clear night sky. as i was getting back in the car i was watching a bright light thinking it was the space station. givng thought that we had humans in it and was admiring our race and that we accomplished that, the light went out. being suprised i stood there and watched. 6 to 7 seconds later it lit up. it became very bright and it looked like a ball with a black stripe across the center. i continued to move in a counterclockwise motion in the sky. it got to about 1 on the clock and moved straight upwards. i watched it move all over for roughly 13 minutes. i left the area and drove to my final stop. i looked in the direction of the sky where it was and it was still there. i went in and got a nurse and she witnessed the same thing. i got out binoculars that i have in car. it then looked like a circle that was a ring with lights on the right side in a 3 toe pattern. i then went in and got a tech to come out and view also. i watched it again for over ten min before i had to leave, it was a 2 hour drive back for me.
content.summary: Flaring light that vanished and flared in sky. also moved in an erratic motion.

content.detailedDescription:
At 11:11 on 9/6/2010 i was sitting in my back yard in san francisco when i noticed 3 star like objects moving fast in line abreast formation at my 2 o'clock position moving se to nw at an undetermined altitude. as they passed my 12 o'clock (directly above me) they started weaving in and out of each other - the port object moved to the middle and the center object passed to the port side then they both moved back again. the starboard object maintained position  - the amazing thing was that the distances between the center and port side objects changed dramatically and looked to almost collide. unfortunately i then lost sight of them behind a building. the total sighting was about 8 seconds. there was no sound. there were no navigation lights.

i hold a commercial pilot's license and i'm convinced they were not aircraft. they were also moving very fast...Faster than 250 knot's required in a tca - but they were not meteorites or shooting stars either. the formation flying was the thing that struck me most. amazing.

interested if anyone else saw them...I am pretty awestruck. unfortunately, it happened too quickly to grab my video camera.
content.summary: Three star-like objects line abreast changing formation.

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside to have a cigarette, and noticed an extremely bright light in the wsw sky.  our home is located in the woods, but i could clearly see it through an opening in the trees.  i first thought it was a planet.  i used my android phone and google sky map software to check.  it was not located anywhere near a planet.  i then yelled for my wife to come outside and look.  she first said no, that she didn't want to.  i stayed outside and watched it for a while.  then i went inside and kept watching it through the window in the front door.  i kept telling her to come and look, and she finally agreed.  we went onto the porch, me, my wife, my daughter (6) and my son (1).  it was more "cigar" shaped than anything, but seemed to have a "tail" on the left (south) side.  it also seemed to have a sphere on the right (north) side that seemed to be orbiting the front (right, north) side. we watched it for some amount of time, approximately 5 minutes.  we did walk out into the yard to look for any other starts, as my wife was trying to dismiss it as a star.  i told her there was no way it was a star, because you couldn't see any other stars in the sky.  also, that this was entirely too bright to be a star, and too large.  she agreed, and said she wanted to get her camera to zoom in and look at it.  when she came back into the living room with the camera, she said it had no batteries.  i told her they were on the charger, and she went to get them.  i think she got busy doing something else, so i went to get the batteries myself.  i put the batteries in the camera, went outside to zoom in and snap a few photos, and it was gone.  i felt very uneasy, and went back into the house and locked the doors.
content.summary: Elongated, seemed to have a darker shape beneath it. spherical shape orbiting it.

content.detailedDescription:
-i was in front yard of my residence doing some weeding. time around 6:45 p.M. still daylight
  though sun was lowering.

-i heard a small aircraft pass over and glanced up and observed a small single prop plane 
  proceeding east, nothing out of ordinary. as it passed out of range a glint of sunlight
  caught my attention. it was at a rather higher altitude than the small plane which had just 
  passed.

-initially it seemed to be a large commercial jetliner. pretty much the shape of a standard
  fuselage. it shone brilliantly in the sunlight like polished aluminum. it was proceeding
  westward at a fairly stately pace.

-i didn't think very much of it at first, even returned to my gardening. then i realized
  that there was something unusual about this aircraft... it seemed to have no visible wings
  or stabilizer. i again looked up and sighted it to check out my impressions. indeed, i
  was unable to discern any wings or stabilizing structures. no lifting surfaces. long cigar
  tubular configuration. it emitted absolutely no sound my hearing could discern. very 
  brilliant reflective surface. no odd motion... it just proceeded along at a leisurely clip.
  had a vague impression of a row of shapes along the flank not unlike standard
  passenger aircraft windows. may have been a white glow at rear of craft but no 
  vapor trail.

-i was not particularly emotionally affected during or after this event, only curious and
  somewhat dubious of my observational skills. however, i have since seen several
  jumbo jets at even higher altitudes and could still discern their wings and hear them.

-the craft made no dramatic disappearance... simply faded into the distance.
content.summary: Rare: known aircraft in sky @ same time, daylight sighting of slim cigar shaped craft.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with husband on deck..Clear night...Looked up to see stars due north and one bright one dimmed out
content.summary: I looked up and saw a star that just dimmed out.

content.detailedDescription: on monday morning  september 6th 2010,  at approximate 1:20 am, i was coming out of my backyard studio after finishing a project, and i noticed what appeared to be a bright star in the southern sky.  as i was walking up my side yard, i noticed it was moving.  i stopped for a minute to watch, and it seemed to move like no conventional aircraft that i am aware of.  it was about the size of a small pea at arms length at about 45 degrees.  at this point i woke up my adult daughter and wife to witness this with me.  my wifes distance vision is poor, so she could only perceive what appeared to her to be a bright star.  my daughter however,  having much better vision as myself also saw what i saw. this star like object at first seemed to be just a bright star to my daughter , as it was motionless when they first came out to look.  after a couple of minutes however , both my daughter and myself witnessed it moving about in a very strange manner.  it seemed to waver back and forth noticeably against the other ���stars���.  it would also jerk forward and side to side or up and down coming to a rest instantly. as i couldn't tell how far away it was, i can't say how far it was moving. i can say that it moved from two to twenty of its perceived size from  my perspective.  my wife and daughter stayed outside for about an hour on and off with me, but i watched this ���craft?��� for four hours.  it never stayed rock still for more than a minute or two.  i was using a high intensity flashlight to shine at it, and it seemed to respond with movement after each attempt.  i was flashing prime numbers at it and just other random patterns. i did take some pictures and video, however it doesn't have any useful reference. it just looks like a star. the video was no better because when it was motionless, i was moving giving it the appearance of motion. it didn't ever shoot at high speed across the sky, but it did traverse in a westerly direction.  i went in the house to go get some sleep at around 5:20 am and it was still up there when i left.  those last 20 minutes it seemed to stay totally motionless, so it seemed the show was over.  i am under the impression that it was under some kind of intelligent control as to respond to the light then cease movement again.  weird!
content.summary: I saw a star like object in the southern sky that did not move like any conventional aircraft that i am aware of.

content.detailedDescription:
Black triangular aircraft- body was larger than a boeing 757, shape was an isosceles triangle. color was flat black. (3)constant orange/yellow lights on front and rear points of craft
(1)strobing red light dead center on the under-side. no sound, 
traveling slow s-sw over county rd. 137. maybe 1k to 2k ft. in the air.
(2)witnesses.

my room-mate and i were on our way back home on greenville county rd. 137(country club rd) and i'd been saying to him to "keep your eyes peeled for ufo's". the road curves a little to the right and starts uphill for a short distance before leveling out and then downhill to a three-way stop. i got within 20'-30' of the stop sign when something bright and moving caught my eye from directly ahead and above a line of pine/cedar trees. at first all i could see was a few lights spread over a fairly large area of the sky up ahead. i yelled to my friend "look at that! holy *&#@! look!. i'd come to a complete stop(15-20 ft. in front of the stop) and we were both hanging out of my truck windows looking at this thing. it was difficult to focus on the object at first. a very large, flat black, triangular aircraft with 3 constant orange/yellow lights on each point and 1 strobing red light in the center of the under-side. object was traveling very slowly giving us around 30 seconds to a good minute of unobstructed view. we both were talking to each other about what we were seeing. once the aircraft flew past the tree-line, we could both see a smaller craft following a short distance behind the large triangle. neither of the aircraft made any noise whatsoever. the second craft seemed to be more equilateral in shape, and the lights on it's body were more recognizable to me as possibly an f-117(size-wise a decent match) or other modern stealth craft. we both watched until it was overhead. i pulled forward to the stop and looked behind me and in my rear-view mirrors and could still see them both. my room-mate continued watching as we turned right onto county rd. 96(gap creek rd). the general direction of travel was s-sw and would have traveled over a good portion of greer, taylors and possibly the greenville downtown airport. most obvious possible destination of interest would be donaldson center (formerly donaldson air force base) which is also the home of lockheed martin. i lived in the moonville, s.C. area very close to the back side of donaldson airfield. over several years living there i had seen many daytime and night-time military flights. c-130's (even the hercules), f-4's, f-16's and even a few black choppers w/ stealth escort. i've included a windows paint sketch of the approx. size and position of the crafts. this is an address link to google street view right where this took place! *(link moved to additional evidence section below--sgonzalez/cms).
content.summary: Large black triangle escorted by smaller stealth craft.

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were driving through bapchule on the i-10 passing the shell gas station at about 3:50am when my sister woke me up and asked me what these two lights that were flying over the field directly next to the freeway. at first it was a green light on one end and a bright light on the other flying a house size above the field it then flew directly over us on the fwy where i saw the shape to make out a boomerang v shape no sound it was gliding; then it turned back around to the field and went right over it again and turned on i believe about 5 lights or so that were big and bright like a stadium light it was pretty big in length size maybe about 4 houses long and it flew very low to the field and up above the shell gas station and hovered over a building behind the gas station turned off all its lights except one star size light then it came back over to these houses by the field looked as if it landed next to them turned on all its lights again and the right corner light this time was orange right next to a house. i was really scared and did not want to find out what was in it lol so we just kept driving on the fwy debating to go back. there were alot of cars on the fwy at the time im sure they saw but ive seen no reports except one from sept 3rd on here that sounds like to be what we have seen. we dont know why this object would be flying directly next to the fwy in clear view of everyone and landing next to it. my sister said she thought she saw it drop something when the green light was on but we went back next day and to much crops to search in. it was the craziest thing we have ever seen being that it was right next to us on ground and flying over us and it was very big in size. whatever it was we hope to hear if anyone has seen this that night. we were thinkin about making a police report but figured they would just disregard our claim.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: V shape boomerang with about 5 lights off i-10 on ground.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving east on 36th going home from the flatirons mall at about 9:20pm.  i was following my significant other who at the time was driving in front of me.  the object was circular and very bright.  appeared in the south east sky.  when my eyes first gazed upon it it hadn't moved yet but after a second started to move very quickly across the sky to the east.  it appeared to move from a higher position in the sky to a lower one. this did not function at all like an airplane, shooting star, satellite, or meteor. it went from one end of my windshield to the other in a matter of seconds and then disappeared.  this was concerning at the time but upon arriving home i was distracted and quickly spaced what i had seen.  it wasn't till last night when my significant other and i were talking that i remembered.  she saw the same thing too and was alarmed at how odd it was.  neither of us necessarily believe in ufo stuff but this was just too weird. we both felt like we had seen something beyond normal.  any light you can shed to this occurrence???

thank you kindly.
content.summary: Driving east on 36th. saw a bright circular light, appeared to be flying rather low. shot across the sky very quickly but steady.

content.detailedDescription: I am a chef in los angeles and this evening i was working the food and wine festival in beverly hills.  at just after five i happened to look up at the sky and noticed a light formation of two separate orbs flying horizontal to one another.  first i ruled out that they were not helicopters due to the altitude and not planes as there was still enough light in the sky to see any airplane outline.  slightly behind it i noticed a second set of identical lights flying in the same formation.  as they flew straight the lights had a slight wobble to their flight path and my co-worker also said he noticed a sort of energy field surrounding the orbs, almost like a halo he stated.  upon reaching the middle of the sky the lights began to stop and between 6-8 new lights began appearing and began making formations in the sky.  the formations appeared to be very geometric in nature and the lights continued putting on a spectacle for between 10-15 min.  after that they disappeared.  during and after the sighting i was absolutely freaked out because i had never seen anything like it.
content.summary: 6-8 lights creating formations in sky above los angeles.

content.detailedDescription: While driving home from grand rapids on us 131 just south of the sand lake exit, my wife and i noticed three red lights in a straight line northwest of our location.  the near object was aprox. 80 degrees above the horizon and was by far the dimmest and was red in color. the center object looked to be two seperate light sources close together and was aprox. 45 degrees above the horizon orange shifting to red in color.  the third object was just off the horizon and was as bright as the center object also red in color.  i could not tell speed or direction of object travel but, as we were moving north at 70-75 mph the objects seemed to be stationary because they drifted behind us out of our line of sight.  my wife and i then made a u-turn at the pierson exit and drove south, but were unable to locate the objects.  at this time my wife noticed a flash like lightining in the distance southwest of our location. after returning to the sand lake exit we again made a u-turn and resumed our trip home going north.  nothing further was seen.  the sky was obscured by clouds and no stars were visible at this time.  there are several cell and radio towers near this location, but the objects we viewed were not toweres. i am a military veteran as well as a pilot and am currently employed as an aircraft mechanic so i consider myself well trained in the observation of flying aircraft and can say these objects did not apear to be flares or known aircraft lighting.
content.summary: Three orange/red lights in trailing formation.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just taken my daughter to work on sunday morning and was returning home. i was traveling down route 309 towards wilkes-barre (northbound) and noticed the sky was clear and blue. as i began to approach my exit, i saw what i thought was a plane flying over the area. i was on a path where planes from our local airport would pass.

as i got closer, i thought maybe it was a blimp. but as i got even closer it looked block like. it was just sitting there. i think the craft was small  no more than 10-15 in length. the craft was box shape and was rectangular on the side and square on the front. the craft was basically black with white edges. i believe i was about a mile or two away.
 
there were not too many people in the highway and i came up to a red light. i turned onto the exit and noticed  my view changed. i was looking into the craft and saw two white lights. (it reminded me of landing lights on a plane.) the craft did not have wings, and it wasn���t a helicopter.

i lost sight of the craft when i turned off the highway. i did look for a safe place to pull over to take a picture but i was not able to do so.

i am a frequent satellite watcher. i have seen several ufos in the past.
content.summary: Flying box hovering.

content.detailedDescription:
i was sitting outside at 20:56 pm on september 5, 2010 and i noticed a light traveling slowly from south to north. i thought it was a passenger airplane and was just going to watch it. the light was steady and bright, about as big and bright as venus in the night sky. it was very high up. 

 it suddenly went dark and i didn���t see it. i thought that was very odd. then a few seconds later the light came back on. it was still traveling south to north and at the same rate of speed. a few seconds later it went dark again. i watched for a few minutes but did not see it again. 


i don't know what it was.  the sky looked clear, and i could see stars and such.  when the object went dark there were no clouds in the area. i didn't have any feelings of fear or excitement, just puzzlement. i didn't look much longer as i suddenly started getting a headache  and my neck got tight.  

after that i came in to fill out the report.  i started not to, because it  doesn't seem to be one of the most exciting sightings, and it's probably something normal.  i just have never seen planes do that light dark thing.
content.summary: Steady light traveling south to north that got dark, then reappeared, then went dark and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i were in the car in an nearly empty parking lot leaving her office, where there is little light pollution. we were facing west and saw what we assumed was a plane, but it was orange in color and emanating a lot of light, it looked like an orange fireball. there is a small airport in town and we are used to seeing various small aircraft so we waited and watched so we could determine what kind of craft it was as it was in the flight range of a small aircraft. as we continued to watch as it travelled towards the east we noticed that it was making no sound. we watched as it made a sharp angle towards lake erie and then gradually it stopped emanating light and was just an orange ball then we could no longer see it. i called my sister to tell her that we saw a fireball in the sky and was on the phone with her for the rest of the duration. my mother and i were facing towards lake erie when we saw a flash in the sky, like a meteor. we turned to look in the original direction the fireball came from and saw another one coming in a similar path but this one seemed to be emanating even more light and was red, then it shifted colors to orange when it was overhead and continued towards the lake. we then saw a third fireball coming. i was scared so i told her to start driving home. at one point we looked back and two of the fireballs were stationary and stacked in a similar way as the phoenix lights. we lost sight of the objects as we went into town. both of us are skeptics and trying to come up with a reasonable explanation. neither of us has seen anything like this. they truly looked like fireballs. i have to think they are flares, but it was just too strange. my mother was not fearful but both of us felt kind of in shock.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange fireball moving towards lake followed by flash then 2 more fireballs, second changed color from red to orange.

content.detailedDescription: I was just outside. i have been watching lots of activity lately but most of it can be explained as planets or plains. once in a while i see something really interesting. tonight was one of those nights. i was just outside admiring the sky and listening to a concert in the distance. when my eyes fell on a star-like object that moved slowly from my left or westerly, to my right. then suddenly as a plane passed near-by (probably at a different altitude) it flashed a bright white light and just sort of "powered up" as i like to say. it satyed bright for a few moments then went dim. it didn't flash off like someone turned off a light but rather dimmed slowly like a candle. it moved until it reach the cassiopeia constellation and stopped. it hung there like an ordinary star. then from the same area where the i first noticed the other one, a new flash appeared. it flashed on quickly then off again. it moved at a different angle, slowly, toward the southwest. it just kept going until i couldn't follow it anymore. i was pretty excited and just had to come in and report it. there has been a lot more activity lately but as i said before this was really unique.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright moving lights, flashed then dimmed.

content.detailedDescription:
On saturday, 09/04/2010 at 21:25 hrs, i stepped out my back door and my attention was drawn to a bright orange light in the wsw sky.  the object was just a few degrees above the horizon, which would put it right at the tops of the distant trees (over 900 ft. away). 

at first i assumed it was venus but the object began to rise in elevation, approximately 2 to 3 degrees.  the object stopped it's ascent and i reach in the door and grabbed my camera, taking two shots.  i then got my binoculars and looked at the light. 

the object was a bright white orange light and for all appearances i would have dismissed the object as venus.  however, venus does not ascend from the west, nor does it move 2 degrees or more in 3 seconds. i also know what venus looks like, with the naked eye and through both binoculars and telescope.  this did not look like venus. i called to my spouse who also looked at the light, saying "it's venus."  after saying that, within seconds the light turned red and disappeared completely.  total viewing time: 10 minutes.

i went back inside, pulled up an astronomy website, checked and saw that venus had set an hour earlier.  i wrote a short report, attached the original photo and sent it off to mufon's director of research.  he did not know what the object is either and confirmed that it wasn't venus. 

attached photo is a cropped version of the original i sent to *(name deleted--sgonzalez/cms).

i must add that my digital still camera will not focus on anything at night, unless the subject is unusually large and bright. it had no problem focusing on this light.
content.summary: Saw bright orange light wsw of breckenridge, which turned red and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my front porch,looking up at the stars as i always do..When i noticed 2 sphere like looking objects flying to the east.  they appeared to be floating as they moved foward..One would pass the other,then, as so with the other.. then they would get close to each other,then seperate..I watched this for about 3 mins...  they appeared to be flying about 1000 ft. or less.I was amazed at what i was seeing..I wanted so bad to get video, but knew it wouldnt turn out..Because of the lighting around me,,(streetlights)..And,if i went to get it,i would miss this..I watched them vanish upward, into some clouds.Still in shock,i ran into the house and told my girlfriend the whole story,she seemed as shocked as i was..!!I have seen some odd things similar to this,but this was one of the best..
content.summary: 2 round objects slowing down and speeding up getting close to each other then separating.

content.detailedDescription:
I went out for a cigarette last night and sat down in a patio chair to look up at the stars. i caught what i thought was a falling star out of the corner of my eye, but when i focused on it, it was clearly much larger. with my arm extended, it would be about the size (and general shape) of an eraser on a pencil. at the same time, there was a spotlight that had been scanning the sky since before i went outside. when i saw the object, i first assumed that there was another spotlight and the image i saw was being distorted by fog or smoke or something. (there was no fog or smoke around. that's just where my brain went, for some reason.) the object was orange and luminous and almost completely round. there was a small indentation, wider than it was deep, that took up a fifth or so of the surface area. it moved in a steady, straight line (which is also why i associated it with the spotlight) and moved slightly slower than a falling star. there were some (cumulous?) clouds in the area and the object passed in front of the cloud and didn't seem to cast any light or shadow on the clouds. it seemed to be disc-shaped, but could have just as well been an orb. it was hard to tell in the night sky. it was silent. 

even though i had a camera phone with me, i was too focused on figuring out what it was to think to take a picture. so, this orange, glowing, pencil eraser-sized object moved in a steady, straight line, a bit more slowly than a meteor, and passed between me and the clouds. i think it just moved beyond my field of vision, but it may have gone behind a more distant cloud. i was so perplexed by what i was seeing that some of the details didn't stick. 

at this point, i didn't think this could possibly be related to the spotlight, but i kept looking up to see if the orange object would reappear along the same flight path. that's about it.

i went inside and decided that i knew what i hadn't seen -- plane, helicopter, satellite -- but had no idea what i had seen. i called my parents and they had no explanation for me and my father suggested i report it to mufon. i did a little searching around hoping to see a similar report (and saw one, not too different in indiana). in the end, i decided that my reporting it might encourage someone else to come forward and i'd be that much closer to figuring out what it was.
content.summary: Orange luminous disc in dc.
